en.bdb: Making of the Guru by the Guru

verse.gurmukhi: gur isKhu gurisKu hY pIr pIrhu koeI[
verse.unicode: ਗੁਰ ਸਿਖਹੁ ਗੁਰਸਿਖੁ ਹੈ ਪੀਰ ਪੀਰਹੁ ਕੋਈ।

en.bdb: By the teachings of the Guru many become disciples of the Guru, but some rare one becomes the Guru like that Guru.

transliteration.english: gur sikhahu gursikh hai peer peerahu koiee|
transliteration.hindi: गुर सिखहु गुरसिखु है पीर पीरहु कोई।
transliteration.en: gur sikhahu gursikh hai peer peerahu koiee|
transliteration.hi: गुर सिखहु गुरसिखु है पीर पीरहु कोई।
transliteration.ipa: Gʊr sɪkʰəh Gʊrəsɪkʰ hæ pir pirəh kɔei.
transliteration.ur: گُر سکھهُ گُرسکھ هَے پیِر پیِرهُ کوای۔

verse.gurmukhi: sbid suriq cylw gurU prmysru soeI[
verse.unicode: ਸਬਦਿ ਸੁਰਤਿ ਚੇਲਾ ਗੁਰੂ ਪਰਮੇਸਰੁ ਸੋਈ।

en.bdb: Only the practitioner of the word and consciousness can attain the status of Guru-God.

transliteration.english: sabadh surat chelaa guroo paramesar soiee|
transliteration.hindi: सबदि सुरति चेला गुरू परमेसरु सोई।
transliteration.en: sabadh surat chelaa guroo paramesar soiee|
transliteration.hi: सबदि सुरति चेला गुरू परमेसरु सोई।
transliteration.ipa: səbəd̪ sʊrət̪ t͡ʃelɑ Gʊru pərəmesər sɔei.
transliteration.ur: سبد سُرت چےلا گُرُو پرمےسر سوای۔

verse.gurmukhi: drsin idsit iDAwnu Dir gur mUriq hoeI[
verse.unicode: ਦਰਸਨਿ ਦਿਸਟਿ ਧਿਆਨੁ ਧਰਿ ਗੁਰ ਮੂਰਤਿ ਹੋਈ।

en.bdb: Such a disciple concentrating on the philosophy of the Guru (and making it a part of daily conduct) himself becomes a likeness of Guru.

transliteration.english: dharasan dhisaT dhiaan dhar gur moorat hoiee|
transliteration.hindi: दरसनि दिसटि धिआनु धरि गुर मूरति होई।
transliteration.en: dharasan dhisaT dhiaan dhar gur moorat hoiee|
transliteration.hi: दरसनि दिसटि धिआनु धरि गुर मूरति होई।
transliteration.ipa: d̪ərəsən d̪ɪsəʈ t̪ɪəɑn t̪ər Gʊr murət̪ hɔei.
transliteration.ur: درسن دسٹ دھآن دھر گُر مُورت هوای۔

verse.gurmukhi: sbd suriq kr kIrqnu siqsMig ivloeI[
verse.unicode: ਸਬਦ ਸੁਰਤਿ ਕਰ ਕੀਰਤਨੁ ਸਤਿਸੰਗਿ ਵਿਲੋਈ।

en.bdb: Making his consciousness attentive to Word through recitation of Naam, he merges in the holy congregation.

transliteration.english: sabadh surat kar keeratan satisa(n)g viloiee|
transliteration.hindi: सबद सुरति कर कीरतनु सतिसंगि विलोई।
transliteration.en: sabadh surat kar keeratan satisa(n)g viloiee|
transliteration.hi: सबद सुरति कर कीरतनु सतिसंगि विलोई।
transliteration.ipa: səbəd̪ sʊrət̪ kər kirət̪ən sət̪ɪsəŋG ʋɪlɔei.
transliteration.ur: سبد سُرت کر کیِرتن ستسںگ ولوای۔

verse.gurmukhi: vwihgurU gur mMqR hY jip haumY KoeI[
verse.unicode: ਵਾਹਿਗੁਰੂ ਗੁਰ ਮੰਤ੍ਰ ਹੈ ਜਪਿ ਹਉਮੈ ਖੋਈ।

en.bdb: His Guru-manta is Vahiguru, whose recitation erases egotism.

transliteration.english: vaahiguroo gur ma(n)tr hai jap haumai khoiee|
transliteration.hindi: वाहिगुरू गुर मंत्र है जपि हउमै खोई।
transliteration.en: vaahiguroo gur ma(n)tr hai jap haumai khoiee|
transliteration.hi: वाहिगुरू गुर मंत्र है जपि हउमै खोई।
transliteration.ipa: ʋɑhɪGʊru Gʊr məŋt̪ɹ hæ d͡ʒəp hoʊmæ kʰɔei.
transliteration.ur: واهگرُو گُر مںتر هَے جپ هامَے کھوای۔

verse.gurmukhi: Awpu gvwey Awip hY gux guxI proeI ]2]
verse.unicode: ਆਪੁ ਗਵਾਏ ਆਪਿ ਹੈ ਗੁਣ ਗੁਣੀ ਪਰੋਈ ॥੨॥

en.bdb: Losing egotism and merging into the qualities of the supreme Lord, he himself becomes full of qualities.

transliteration.english: aap gavaae aap hai gun gunee paroiee ||2||
transliteration.hindi: आपु गवाए आपि है गुण गुणी परोई ॥२॥
transliteration.en: aap gavaae aap hai gun gunee paroiee ||2||
transliteration.hi: आपु गवाए आपि है गुण गुणी परोई ॥२॥
transliteration.ipa: əɑp Gəʋɑee əɑp hæ Gʊɳ Gʊɳi pərɔei.2.
transliteration.ur: آپ گوااے آپ هَے گُݨ گُݨیِ پروای ۔۔۲۔۔
